items.sentence: Tom walked into his room and closed the door.
Tom should tell Mary why he wants to do that.
Tom says he hopes Mary won't want to do that.
Tom promised me he'd help me paint my garage.
Tom never leaves the house without his phone.
Tom isn't going to answer any more questions.
Tom is going to meet with all of you at 2:30.
Tom is going to make an announcement at 2:30.
Tom is going to go, no matter what Mary says.
Tom is going to go swimming tomorrow morning.
